MainPage.heading: Welcome to Our GraphiQL Project!
MainPage.shortDescription: Hello there! We’re excited to share something special with you – a project that's close to our hearts. We’ve been working hard to bring this idea to life, and we can't wait to show you what we've built.
MainPage.firstFeature: An Interactive Query Editor: This isn’t just a tool, it’s your playground for GraphQL queries. Experiment, learn, and see your data dance.
MainPage.secondFeature: Documentation at Your Fingertips: Ever wished for an easy way to navigate through your schema? We’ve got you covered.
MainPage.thirdFeature: A Design That Adapts: Whether on a desktop or on the go with your mobile, experience the same clarity and efficiency.
MainPage.aboutUsText: We are a trio of developers, each bringing our unique perspective. Our project is more than a display of our technical abilities, it's a testament to our collaborative spirit and mutual journey in the ever-evolving landscape of web development. United by our curiosity and a common goal, we're not just coding. We're learning, growing, and exploring new frontiers.
MainPage.aboutCourseText: This project is a part of the Rolling Scopes School's React course, a journey through the vibrant landscape of web development. It stands out as one of the premier open-source courses available online.
